name: Tin Run
description:
This game is a first person platforming obstacle course.  You navigate a corridor full of industrial traps while a wall of flames slowly advances behind you.  As you progress you will reach new checkpoints, and if you fall victim to a trap you will respawn at your current spawn point.  If the flames reach your current checkpoint before you can complete the course, it's game over.

Controls: WASD to move, spacebar to jump, and shift to sprint.

The game has been tested on a Windows machine and has worked correctly, it should also work on Mac and Linux, but if you run into a problem please let me know.

NOTE:

This is one of the first games I ever made in Unity.  I did not make the visual or audio assets involved, they were downloaded for free off of the Unity store, and I am currently seeking the original collections they were taken from so I can credit the makers here.  If you think you might know one or more of the creators of the assets I used, please do send a message or leave a comment.
